import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthCallback=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const params=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);const token=params.get("access_token");console.log("Erhaltener Token:",token);// Debugging
if(token){localStorage.setItem("spotify_token",token);navigate("/gamemode");}else{console.error("Fehler: Kein Token erhalten!");}},[navigate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Authentifizierung l\xE4uft..."});};export default AuthCallback;
